name: microservices-gcp
description: ðŸ“– LEARN: Going through Udemy's "Microservices with Node JS and React" course to learn about practical GCP development.

scripts.prepare: cd posts && npm i && cd  ../comments && npm i && cd ../moderation && npm i && cd ../query && npm i && cd ../event-bus && npm i && cd ../client && npm i && cd .. && echo "Done installing!"
scripts.build:images: cd posts && docker build -t sg/posts . && cd  ../comments && docker build -t sg/comments . && cd ../moderation && docker build -t sg/moderation . && cd ../query && docker build -t sg/query . && cd ../event-bus  && docker build -t sg/event-bus . && cd ../client && docker build -t sg/client . && cd .. && echo "Done creating images!"
